title: issues with mastery selection during que
body: So while in que and im trying to set up my mastery page, it appears as though its stuck and i cant remove any of the mastery points that are there. But if i clear them and re-enter them as i want and press save then it saves what i selected. but im just not able to see what i select while im selecting it... not sure if its a minor bug or something

replies.body: yes thank you, it helped a lot!!{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Is this happening on the updated client?  What happens if you try on the legacy client:

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"

If it's isolated to the updated client, be sure to report it on the client boards.  Hope that helps!
